name: React JS
description: This course provides an in-depth study of the fundamentals of full stack development.

name: Linear Algebra
description: This course introduces basic concepts, algorithms, theory, and applications of linear algebra.

name: Object Oriented Design
description: CS3100 teaches a rigorous approach to object-oriented programming and design.

name: Intro to Databases
description: This course will introduce you to relational database management systems (RDBMS).

name: Games and Society
description: Provides a historical and cultural perspective on games and other forms of mediated culture.

name: Probability and Statistics
description: This is an introduction course to the theory of probability and statistics.

name: Computer Systems
description: We will be exploring many low-level components of computer systems and learning to think like a systems programmer.

description: This course covers the basics of mathematical reasoning and problem solving.

name: Algorithms and Data
description: This is an introductory undergraduate course in algorithms.

description: This course introduces the mathematical structures and methods that form the foundation of computer science.
